subtitleNullable: The Shafdan wastewater treatment plant's bio-reactor's measurments
descriptionNullable:
## The Shafdan Wastewater treatment plant's bio-reactor's measurments

### Data Description
A description of the measurements can be seen in the paper "Prediction of wastewater treatment quality using LSTM neural network".  
These measurements are recorded every minute, and split into monthly files, in a csv format.
[View the dataset in kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/nitzanfarhi/shafdan-wwtp).


### License
This dataset is publicly available for researchers. If you are using our dataset,   
you should cite our related research paper which outlines the details of the dataset and its underlying principles:
 
@article{farhi2021prediction,  
title = {Prediction of wastewater treatment quality using LSTM neural network},  
  author = {Farhi, Nitzan and Kohen, Efrat and Mamane, Hadas and Shavitt, Yuval},  
  journal = {Environmental Technology & Innovation},  
  volume = {23},  
  pages = {101632},  
  year = {2021},  
  publisher = {Elsevier}  
}
